job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life Our portfolio of lifechanging technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare with leading businesses and products in diagnostics medical devices nutritionals and branded generic medicines Our 109000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countriesltbrgtltbrgtA healthy heart is essential to good health Thats why were committed to advancing treatments for people with cardiovascular disease As a global leader in Cardiac Rhythm Technologies our breakthrough medical technologies help restore peoples health so they can get back to living their best lives faster We focus on innovative technologies that can improve the way doctors treat people with heart arrhythmias or irregular heartbeatsltbrgtltbrgtOur location inltstronggt ltugtSunnyvale CA or Sylmarltugtltstronggtltstronggtltugt CAltugtltstronggtltugtltugt currently has an opportunity for a ltstronggtltugtSoftware quality and appropriate regulatory agency requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork on software design coding and unit testing software supporting verification and validation testing and ensuring that all product development conforms to design specifications and coding standards for medical devicesltligtltligtExercise judgment in coding following the software requirements designs and conducting investigation activities following defined methodsltligtltligtDesign and implement software in current programming languages such as C and Java Demonstrate good understanding of objectoriented programming and put objectoriented programming principles in practiceltligtltligtAssist in the preparation of software design requirements and detailed design specifications for implementation of software designs per Abbott design development processltligtltligtAssist in the evaluation of selected designs through testing and full documentation of the resultsltligtltligtWork on problems of moderate scope where analysis of situations or data requires evaluation of identifiable factorsltligtltligtExercise judgment within defined procedures and practices to determine appropriate actionltligtltligtComplies with US Food and Drug Administration FDA regulations other regulatory requirements Company policies operating procedures processes and task assignments Maintains positive and cooperative communications and collaboration with all levels of employees customers contractors and Computer Science or related engineering field or an equivalent combination of education and work experienceltligtltligtMinimum 6 months in software development combination of programmingheavy coursework school projects freelance work and professional experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We OfferltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Abbott you can have a good job that can grow into a retirement savings with a generous company matchltligtltligtThe stability of a company with a record of strong financial performance and history of being actively involved in local
